Keywords: Doom Patrol , Scientist
Real Name: Niles Caulder
Special Powers
SECRETLY MANUFACTURING THEIR ACCIDENTS: When establishing themed teams, choose a character with the Celebrity keyword, a character with the Robot keyword, and/or a character with the Soldier keyword. The chosen characters gain the Doom Patrol keyword and have Outsiders team ability this game.
DEFEND ME AT ALL COSTS: POWER: Choose an adjacent friendly character with the Doom Patrol keyword and move them up to 5 squares.
HURTING THOSE I CREATED: Mastermind. When The Chief uses it, he may choose a friendly character within 4 squares and line of fire that he shares a keyword with.
THE WORLD'S STRANGEST HEROES: Leadership. When The Chief uses it and succeeds, this turn when a friendly character uses Outsiders team ability to target themselves, they have SAFEGUARD: Outwit until your next turn.
